Plot: A documentary that questions the cost -- and value -- of higher education in the United States.
Title: Ivory Tower
Actors: Elizabeth Armstrong, Richard Arum, Jamshed Bharucha, David Boone
tomatoConsensus: Although Ivory Tower makes it clear that there isn't enough room in a 90-minute film to tackle spiraling student loan debt, it also serves as a compelling call for deeper investigation.
